text: Iepe B. T. Rubingh (; 17 August 1974 - 9 May 2020) was a Dutch artist who was best known for starting chess boxing in 2003. He was born in Rotterdam. Rubingh died on 9 May 2020 in Berlin, aged 45.Iepe Rubingh, de Rotterdamse uitvinder van chessboxing, overleden ==References== ==Other websites== *His own website *An interview with the artist Category:1974 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch boxers Category:Dutch chess players Category:Artists from Rotterdam Category:Sportspeople from Rotterdam
title: Iepe Rubingh
